channel.title: Comments on: Doing UPSERTs in MongoDB
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Sql Daddy
item.dc:creator: Sql Daddy
item.description: Hi SQLDenis I have read your post its really very informative and you explain very nicely. I also read relevant about <a href="https://zappysys.com/blog/ssis-loading-data-into-mongodb-upsert-update-delete-insert/" rel="nofollow">Upsert MongoDB </a> for bulk update or bulk insert JSON documents. To know more about the package follow the link: https://zappysys.com/blog/ssis-loading-data-into-mongodb-upsert-update-delete-insert/
item.content:encoded:
Hi SQLDenis
I have read your post its really very informative and you explain very nicely. I also read relevant about Upsert MongoDB for bulk update or bulk insert JSON documents.
To know more about the package follow the link: https://zappysys.com/blog/ssis-loading-data-into-mongodb-upsert-update-delete-insert/

item.title: By: Questions
item.dc:creator: Questions
item.description: What would this look like in C# "db.things.update({BlogPost: "How To Do Upserts"}, {$inc: {Hits: 1}}, { upsert: true });" ?
item.content:encoded: What would this look like in C# “db.things.update({BlogPost: “How To Do Upserts”}, {$inc: {Hits: 1}}, { upsert: true });” ?
